name: FINALSWORD MobileEdition
description:
The Real 3D OpenWorld ARPG, with your iPhone and iPad anywhere.

[Story]
Not long ago, monsters broke into the peaceful the Laurel’s village.
However, what is more urgent for the main character now is his mother,
In order to cure mother's illness, he must find herbs, but there are more evil monsters out of the village.
The main character that has never held a sword on his hand leaves the village for his mother despite his father’s dissuasion.
A gigantic monster is attacking and.. an unknown crying of the forest.
Go on an adventure to be a hero right now!!

[Description]
- FINAL SWORD(ME) is a series of ARPG games you can play on your iPhone and iPad.
- Breathtaking battles with monsters.
- Do worldwide missions, use a sword and various magic
- Level valance of Mobile Edition is different from Console Version.

[Specifications]
- Compatible iPhone : iPhone 6S or higher (Unable to run below iPhone6)
- Compatible iPad : iPad 5th Generation or higher / iPadPro 1st Generation or higher /  iPad mini 4th Generation or higher
- Minimum RAM : 2GB
- Recommended RAM 3GB or higher
- MFI Gamepad is supported(You can select gamepad option on the main title)
- No additional charge after the download.
- You do not need a Wifi connection

Support E-mail : customerservice@hupgames.com
